summary:
* Maintained and developed new version of Taiwan Rakuten Ichiba Android application
* Maintained and developed new version of Rakuma Taiwan Android application
* Learned Kotlin and Coroutine, and convert codes from Java to Kotin
* Apply MVVM when refactoring or developing new features
* Setup and write unit tests with Robolectric, Mockito, Mockk and Google Trust
* Migrate Android Support libraries to AndroidX
* Use Retrofit, Gson and Moshi to call APIs
Developed and maintained Android application and framework for Kebbi robot.
